about_the_game:
Control an orc and have your way with a sister of the faith in this
2D fighting game style action mini game. (Created with Unity + Spine)

The controls are simple. Cursor keys only!
Left Right Up Down Double Tap Up Double Tap Down
For movement, body fondling, air borne slime and aphrodisiac mist!
Defeat the sister and have your way with her.
She may resist at first, but the more she cums... the more she succumbs!

12 x erotic animations in total!
(2 x normal / 2 x special / 8 x grappling attacks)
Each of them have speed changing, cumming and orgasm patterns!
Also included is a butt naked mode!

The objective of the game?
To 'play' with a sister of the faith of course!
Nothing more, nothing less.
She may attack but Orc man is strong! Grahw!
At the same time, Orc man is a gentleman. No women killing here!

* Voiced with sound effects and BGM.

CV: Ao Inukai
Illustration: Sawati
Animation: CatBellUnion
Planning / Production: KooooN Soft

content_descriptors.notes: This game has sexual behavior or sexual assault, and all depicted game characters are over 18 years old.

name: SisterFight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windos 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD620 +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: 2D fighting game style action mini game.
